text: Pedro Henrique Perotti (born 22 November 1997), known as Pedro Perotti or simply Perotti, is a Brazilian professional footballer who plays as a forward for Chapecoense. ==Club career== Born in Seberi, Rio Grande do Sul, Pedro Perotti was a Chapecoense youth graduate. He made his senior debut on 12 March 2016, coming on as a late substitute in a 4–0 Campeonato Catarinense home win against Camboriú.
